title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions
OB: The files in the File menu's Most Recently Used (MRU) list are not persisted between sessions. Notice how the files appear in the MRU list during the current session but do not appear in the MRU list when the workbench is restarted. These files should be retained in the MRU list between sessions.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Start the workbench. 2. Open 2 or 3 files. 3. Shutdown the workbench. 4. Restart the workbench.
